qrList.label: isvardefined
shuffle
qrList.message:
/len {{getvar::arr}} | /setvar key=len |
/setvar key=i |
/times {{pipe}} {:
  /rand from=0 to={{getvar::i}} round=floor |
  /setvar key=i2 |
  /addvar key=i -1 |
  /getvar index={{getvar::i}} arr |
  /setvar key=tmp |
  /getvar index={{getvar::i2}} arr |
  /setvar key=arr index={{getvar::i}} |
  /setvar key=arr index={{getvar::i2}} {{getvar::tmp}}
:} |
/getvar arr

qrList.label: pop
qrList.message:
/setvar key=i 0 |
/setvar key=i2 0 |
/flushvar newarr |
/len {{getvar::arr}} | /setvar key=len |
/times {{pipe}} {:
  /if left=i right={{arg::topopidx}} rule=eq else={:
    /getvar index={{getvar::i}} arr |
    /setvar key=newarr index={{getvar::i2}} |
    /addvar key=i2 1
  :}
  {:
    /getvar index={{getvar::i}} arr |
    /setvar key=popval |
  :} |
  /addvar key=i 1
:} |
/getvar newarr

qrList.label: -- regextract
qrList.title: deprecated
